item.title: Multiple items needed to open a box
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Could make a boolean like this one:

public boolean hasKeys(){
    if(playerHasItemAmount(3461, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(3461, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(3461, 1)
        && playerHasItemAmount(3461, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(3461, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(3461, 1)){
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

And call it like this:

if(hasKeys){
